DOC.brief_summary: The purpose project evaluate efficacy 9-month Family Child Care Home ( FCCH ) -based intervention , Keys Healthy Family Child Care Homes , increase physical activity improve diet quality child ( 1.5 4.9 year ) .
DOC.brief_title: Keys Healthy Family Child Care Homes
DOC.detailed_description: Childhood obesity major public health problem important predictor obesity later life . Although early childhood formative period dietary activity habit , little research target young age group conduct . Child care facility prime set intervention target young child , give number family use form out-of-home care . Family child care home ( FCCH ) particular type child care facility provider care child his/her residence . FCCHs generally less regulated child care center , significant percentage meet establish recommendation physical activity nutrition practice . While great need intervene setting , one publish obesity prevention intervention FCCHs date . Interventions target FCCH provider could help promote healthy child weight create child care environment provide support active play opportunity healthy food choice , help provider become role model healthy lifestyle ( physical activity diet ) . However , child care industry face many challenge , include limited profitability . By incorporate strategy overcome economic challenge , intervention may able easily address barrier implement sustain change need promote regular physical activity healthy dietary intake child . This project use cluster-randomized controlled trial ( RCT ) test efficacy 9-month intervention , Keys Healthy Family Child Care Homes , target FCCHs . Keys deliver three module design promote ( 1 ) provider health provider healthy role model , ( 2 ) physical activity- nutrition-supportive environment FCCH , ( 3 ) healthy business practice . Each module deliver via group workshop , on-site visit phone contact use Motivational Interviewing-inspired coach educational toolkits . By combine component , ultimate objective create healthy stable FCCHs promote healthy physical activity eat behavior child . The project recruit randomize 165 FCCHs ( 83 per arm ) . At FCCH , subject include one child care provider 3 child ( target child age 1.5 4 year old , one two additional child younger 18 month may also take part height weight measurement ) . These 165 FCCHs 825 child ( 495 child age 1.5-4.9 year old 330 child age young 18 month ) recruit five wave course 3 year , wave enrol 30 FCCHs ( half assign study arm ) . For recruitment , target area low income household high prevalence child overweight/obesity within 100 mile radius University North Carolina Chapel Hill ( UNC ) Duke University . For wave , potential FCCHs identify online database license program provide North Carolina Division Child Development Early Education ( http : //ncchildcaresearch.dhhs.state.nc.us/search.asp ) . Trained project staff contact potential FCCH provider mail/email ( informational flyer/packets ) , telephone , promotion local professional meeting community event . Informed consent obtain provider parent participate child . Data collection occur 9-month intervention , participate child care provider receive $ 200 completion measure time point . At follow-up , also recruit newly enrol child age 1.5 5 year old ( one two per home , thus 210 additional child ) take part measure allow additional cross-sectional analysis . Increased child physical activity improve quality child diet FCCH primary outcome use assess impact innovative , theory-driven intervention . Secondary outcome mediator include child body mass index , provider body mass index , provider weight-related behavior ( dietary intake physical activity ) , provider motivation , self-efficacy social support , obesogenic ( nutrition- physical activity-related ) environmental characteristic FCCH ( include policy , practice communication provider parent ) . Primary analysis primary aim involve test hypothesis intent-to-treat principle use Generalized Linear Mixed Models ( GLMM ) account correlation induce cluster child within FCCHs . Statistical analysis employ Statistical Analysis System ( SAS ) .
DOC.criteria: FCCH must least 2 child age 1.5 4 year currently enrol . * At least 2 children/families must agree take part FCCH remain eligible . ( Note : Children age 017 month may take part height weight measurement ) FCCH must business least 2 year . FCCH must work telephone number . Provider must able read speak English . FCCHs serve exclusively special need child . FCCHs close summer month .
